description: G3 (T1) Cypress - cavity at approx 3m from ground level - Fell (replant fastigiate x1 Tulip as replacement)G3 (T5) Cypress - large historic ripped out wound on stem at 1m - Fell (replant x1 fastigiate Tulip as replacement)G3 (T8) Cypress - Historical partially windswept tree - Fell (replant x1 fastigiate Tulip as replacement)G3 (T2, T3, T6, T7) Dead - remove (exempt works) G10 (x10) Cypress group - Fell due to poor condition and dysfunctionality / poor specimens)  (replant x5 fastigiate Yew/s as replacements)T15 Ash - mulltistemm with associated bark inclusion at ground level - Fell (replant x1 fastigiate Oak as replacement)T18 Goat Willow - reduce vitality, cavity at ground level, poor condition - Fell (replant x1 fastigiate Beech as replacement) Neighbouring Ash - large long over extended lateral - reduce back aforementioned lateral by 3-4mT19 Oak - large dominant tree with over extended lateral branches - Overall crown reduction of 4-5mT20 Oak - large dominant tree of poor form and vitality - Fell (replant x1 fastigiate Beech as replacement) T21 Maple - Historically pollarded tree of poor form and condition - Fell (replant x1 fastigiate Beech as replacement) T25 Oak - Prune back to previous pruning points. (TPO no.11, 1971)
